page.title: 14A Pupil's Day
page.content: A usual day for me would be to get up at 8.00am. I have breakfast of cereal and pure orange juice. Then I walk to school. The school opens at 9.15am. I usually arrive at 9.00am. At school in the morning we usually do mental arithmetic and maths. Our playtime starts at 10.30am and ends at 10.45am. I play Buzz Off with my friends Laurae and Susan. After playtime we spend the rest of the morning doing maths and sometimes using the computer. We have lunch at 12.20pm. I usually have a sandwich or chips and a cup of coffee. After lunch we have our project and sometimes sports. We have playtime at 2.15pm until 2.30pm and go home at 3.30. When I get home I get changed and play my violin. After my tea I watch T.V. My favourite programme is Spitting Image.
